nodes.documentation:
XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker,
or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
nodes.name: XBRChannel

nodes.documentation: Event emittedd when a new XBR data market has opened.
nodes.name: Opened

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel is closing (that is, one of the two state channel
participants has called "close()", initiating start of the channel timeout).
nodes.name: Closing

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel has finally closed, which happens after both state
channel participants have called close(), agreeing on last state, or after the timeout
at latest - in case the second participant doesn't react within timeout)
nodes.name: Closed

nodes.documentation:
Constructor for this contract, only called once (when deploying the network).

    /// @param marketAdr The XBR markets contract this instance is associated with.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view external returns (uint256,string memory,string memory,enum XBRTypes.MemberLevel,bytes memory)
function (address) view external returns (uint256,string memory,string memory,enum XBRTypes.MemberLevel,bytes memory)
function (address,struct XBRTypes.EIP712ChannelOpen memory,bytes memory) pure returns (bool)

nodes.name: openChannel

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,struct XBRTypes.EIP712ChannelClose memory,bytes memory) pure returns (bool)
function (address,struct XBRTypes.EIP712ChannelClose memory,bytes memory) pure returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()`
submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the
other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too.
When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree,
the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is
transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred
back to the original sender.
nodes.name: closeChannel

nodes.documentation:
XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker,
or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
nodes.name: XBRChannel

nodes.documentation: Event emittedd when a new XBR data market has opened.
nodes.name: Opened

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel is closing (that is, one of the two state channel
participants has called "close()", initiating start of the channel timeout).
nodes.name: Closing

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel has finally closed, which happens after both state
channel participants have called close(), agreeing on last state, or after the timeout
at latest - in case the second participant doesn't react within timeout)
nodes.name: Closed

    /// @param marketAdr The XBR markets contract this instance is associated with.

nodes.documentation:
Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()`
submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the
other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too.
When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree,
the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is
transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred
back to the original sender.
nodes.name: closeChannel

params.account: The account to grant maintainer rights to.

params.marketAdr: The XBR markets contract this instance is associated with.

isMaintainer(address).return: `true` if the account is maintainer, otherwise `false`.

params.actor: The actor (buyer/seller in the market) that opened this channel.
params.amount: The amount initially transfered to and held in the channel until closed.
params.channelId: The ID of the new XBR channel (must be unique).
params.ctype: Channel type: payment or paying channel.
params.delegate: The delegate (off-chain) allowed to spend/earn-on this channel (off-chain)  in the name of the actor (buyer/seller in the market).
params.marketId: The ID of the XBR market this channel is associated with.
params.openedAt: Block number when the channel opening signature was created.
params.recipient: The receiver (on-chain) of the channel payout.
params.signature: EIP712 signature, signed by the member.
params.timeout: The channel timeout period that begins with the first call to `close()`

addMaintainer(address).notice: Add a new maintainer to the list of maintainers.

closeChannel(bytes16,uint32,uint256,bool.notice: Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()` submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too. When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree, the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred back to the original sender.

methods.constructor: Constructor for this contract, only called once (when deploying the network).

isMaintainer(address).notice: Check if the given address is currently a maintainer.

openChannel(uint8,uint256,bytes16,bytes1.notice: Open a new XBR payment/paying channel for processing off-chain micro-transactions.

userdoc.notice: XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker, or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
